title: Liar of Kudzu
description: After encountering a crashed spacecraft while touring around the new girl in town, Pete Larson, nicknamed Liar, turns to his science-obsessed classmate Bobby Ray for guidance, but when they discover that the UFO is there to do danger to their town, Liar worries that no one will heed his warnings due to his bad reputation as a known embellisher of facts.
author: Bob Schooley
